channel.title: Idaho County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Idaho County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 - Kooskia
item.description: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 in Kooskia. Turn right for ID-13 east to US-12 jct; left for ID-13 west to (Kooskia) City Center.

item.title: Bus. ID-13 West - Entering Kooskia
item.description: Entering Kooskia on Bus. ID-13 West.

item.title: Bus. ID-13 West To ID-13 - Kooskia
item.description: Bus. ID-13 West To ID-13 in Kooskia.

item.title: US-12 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-12 west. Distance to Powell, Kooskia, and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South At Cottonwood South Entrance
item.description: US-95 South at Business US-95 at the southern entrance to Cottonwood. Turn here for access to Keuterville.

item.title: US-95 South at Cottonwood Northern Entrance
item.description: US-95 South at Business US-95 at the northern entrance to Cottonwood. Continue south on US-95 for Grangeville and Boise.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching Cottonwood
item.description: US-95 South approaching the northern entrance to Cottonwood.

item.title: US-95 South at Ferdinand
item.description: US-95 South at Ferdinand.

item.title: End ID-13 North at US-12
item.description: End ID-13 north at US-12. Use US-12 west for Kamiah and Lewiston. Use US-12 east for Missoula (Montana).

item.title: ID-13 South - Nez Perce Trail
item.description: Begin ID-13 south. ID-13 is signed as the Nez Perce Trail and Northwest Passage Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-12 West - Northwest Passage Scenic Byway
item.description: Northwest Passage Scenic Byway (Clearwater Canyon) on US-12 west.

item.title: End ID-13 north at US-12
item.description: End ID-13 north at US-12

item.title: ID-162 East at Old ID-7 Jct.
item.description: ID-162 east at Old ID-7 junction. Use ID-162 for Kamiah. Use Old ID-7 for Grangeville.

item.title: US-95 South - Trucker Warning on White Bird Hill
item.description: Trucker warning on US-95 south at the top of White Bird Hill. White Bird Grade is a 8 mile grade with steepness up to 7%.

item.title: Johnson Lane at US-95 to Grangeville and Riggins
item.description: Johnson Lane south at US-95 to Grangeville and Riggins. Johnson Lane is a cutoff that shaves a few miles of driving on US-95 and avoids the town of Grangeville.

item.title: US-12 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-12 west at Lolo Pass. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-13
item.description: US-95 north at ID-13 east to Kooskia. Continue north on US-95 for Craigmont and Lewiston.

item.title: ID-13 South Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-13 south approaching US-95. Merge right for US-95 north to Lewiston; merge left for US-95 south to Riggins and Boise.

item.title: ID-13 South Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-13 south approaching US-95 south in Grangeville.

item.title: ID-13 South at ID-14
item.description: ID-13 south to Grangeville at ID-14 to Elk City.

item.title: ID-13 South at US-95
item.description: End ID-13 south at US-95 in Grangeville.

item.title: US-12 West Approaching ID-13
item.description: US-12 west approaching ID-13 south to Stites and Grangeville. Continue west on US-12 for Kamiah and Lewiston.

item.title: US-12 West At ID-13
item.description: US-12 west at ID-13 west in Kooskia.

item.title: US-95 North - Mountain Time Zone/Salmon River
item.description: Mountain Time Zone at Salmon River on US-95 South
